ChatMessage.localDesc: On your server only, no cloud connection

ChatPanel.emptyState: I am your AI assistant for document redaction. Upload a document to start the conversation.

ConsentModal.title: Confirm Document Access
ConsentModal.description: The AI assistant wants to read the content of your documents to make redaction suggestions.
ConsentModal.choose: Choose how the document content should be processed:
ConsentModal.cloudDesc: Fast and powerful. Azure OpenAI is GDPR-compliant and ISO 27001/27017/27018 certified.
ConsentModal.cloudDescSuffix: — data is not stored. The US Cloud Act has never been applied to EU government customers.
ConsentModal.localDesc: Processing on your own GPU server only. No cloud connection for document content. Requires a configured local LLM instance (e.g. Ollama).
ConsentModal.privacyNote: Your documents are {strong} — neither on our servers nor at OpenAI. Document content only leaves your device for the respective API call.

SettingsPopover.notReleasedDesc: No document content is transmitted to external services
SettingsPopover.cloudDesc: Azure OpenAI — GDPR-compliant, no data retention, no training on your data
SettingsPopover.localDesc: Ollama-compatible endpoint on your own GPU server — no external data transfer
SettingsPopover.spacyDesc: Local NLP analysis without AI model (Docker only)
SettingsPopover.piiDesc: Redacts names, addresses, contact details and other personal data
SettingsPopover.foiDesc: Redacts according to the exemptions of the applicable freedom of information law
SettingsPopover.gdprNote: Azure OpenAI is GDPR certified. No data storage, no model training with your data.

App.uploadHint: Drag & drop or click to select
App.exportTooltip: PDF with visible yellow highlights — for review and approval
App.redactTooltip: Text irreversibly removed — ready for publication

About.heroDesc: EasyRedact combines an intelligent AI assistant with a PDF viewer — for redactions under data protection and freedom of information law.
About.workflowTitle: Three steps to a redacted document
About.step1Desc: PDF or DOCX via drag & drop. Multiple documents at once.
About.step2Desc: Assistant reads the document, suggests redactions. Review and adjust suggestions.
About.step3Desc: Preview PDF or final version with irreversibly removed text.
About.featureAIDesc: A chat agent reads the document, asks targeted follow-up questions, and suggests all relevant redactions in one step — with a confidence score for each suggestion.
About.featureListDesc: All redactions in chronological order or grouped by person. Accept or reject suggestions with one click — individually or in bulk.
About.featureFOIDesc: In FOI mode, each redaction is assigned a specific legal reason — §3–6 German Freedom of Information Act, EU Regulation 1049/2001, and other legal systems.
About.featureManualDesc: Select text by click-and-drag or freehand directly in the document. Accept or reject assistant suggestions with one click.
About.featureGroupDesc: Redactions are grouped by person and category in the left sidebar. All entries for a person can be accepted or rejected at once.
About.featureMultiDocDesc: Upload PDFs and DOCX files as a batch. The assistant has context over all documents simultaneously and can make cross-document suggestions.
About.featurePrivacyDesc: Choose between Azure OpenAI (GDPR-compliant, no data retention), an Ollama-compatible language model on your own server, or fully local language processing in the browser — without any cloud connection.
About.featureExportDesc: Preview export with visible highlights for internal review. Final export with irreversibly removed text — ready for publication.
